line.color: Sets the default line color for the plot. Can be set per line with c=
line.alpha: Sets the default line alpha for the plot. Can be set per line with a=
line.function: Sets the default analysis function for the plot. Can be set per line with f=
line.data: Adds a data field to the plot
line.line: Adds a line to the plot - e.g. -l m9C5,45:122
line.title: Adds a custom title to the plot - e.g. -t "My Title"
line.output: Adds a custom filename to the plot - e.g. "my_plot" - no extension
line.no_cutoff: Don't trim acceleration values at cutoff time
line.xbounds: Cut data at values along x axis. -x 4 -4 is same as -x 4
line.ybounds: Cut data at values along y axis. -y 4 -4 is same as -y 4

map.data: Adds data field to the plot
map.dimensions: Dimensions of resulting plot in inches
map.time: Time value - either time or period depending on data
map.realization: Adds simulation data to the plot
map.zvalues: Adds zvalue data to the plot
map.levels: Minimum and maximum displayed values. "auto auto" by default
map.title: Adds a custom title to the plot - e.g. -t "My Title"
map.realizationfn: Function to combine multiple realizations. Options: mean (default) std max min
map.timefn: Function to combine multiple time values. Options: None (default) mean std max min
map.output: Adds a custom filename to the plot - e.g. "my plot", no extension
map.no_cutoff: Don't trim acceleration values at cutoff time

display.realization: Specifies data to view, one or more arguments.

generate.command: Generates M9CSZ data from M9 data by re-calculating spectra

file.command: Opens a file as arguments. Allows for many operations in a single file, delimited by blank lines
